main event: On September 1, 1949, two young men sighted an unidentified flying object near Knoxville, Tennessee.
interesting points: The object was reported to be flying at a very high altitude, estimated between 40,000 and 50,000 feet,The object appeared to be disc shaped and flat,From its reflection, it seemed to be made of a metal similar to that used in airplane construction,There was no evidence of exhaust, vapor trails, or sound from the object,The object faded from view after 2-3 minutes of sighting.
witness description: Both witnesses were young men from Knoxville, one 18 years old and a senior in high school, while the other was 14 years old and appeared older.
